section1.title: 1. General Information
section1.text: We take the protection of your personal data very seriously. This policy explains what data we collect, how we use it, and your rights regarding your data when visiting our website.

section2.title: 2. Data Controller
section2.text:
AZ Hardware & Software Solutions
Owner: Zahra Rafieirad
Address: Musterstraße 12, 10115 Berlin, Germany
Email: info@az-hardware.de

section3.title: 3. Collection and Use of Personal Data
section3.text: We only collect personal data that you voluntarily provide, for example, through our contact form or email. This data is used exclusively to process your request and is not shared with third parties without consent.

section4.title: 4. Server Log Files
section4.text: When visiting our site, your browser automatically transmits data (e.g., IP, browser type, time). This data is stored for technical reasons and not linked to any personal identity.

section5.title: 5. Cookies
section5.text: Our website may use cookies to improve functionality. You can disable cookies in your browser, but some parts of the site may not function properly.

section6.title: 6. Data Retention
section6.text: We retain personal data only as long as necessary for the stated purposes or as required by law.

section7.title: 7. Your Rights
section7.text: You have the right to access, correct, delete, or restrict the processing of your personal data. To exercise these rights, contact us at info@az-hardware.de.

section8.title: 8. Changes to This Policy
section8.text: We may update this policy periodically. The latest version will always be available on this website.
